Q_DESC:
Given an integer array and a non-negative integer k, count all distinct pairs with difference equal to k, i.e., A[ i ] - A[ j ] = k.

Input:
The first line contains the size of the array, the second line has the elements of the array and the third line consists of the difference k.

Output:
In a line print the number of times difference k exists between the elements of the array.
